mdRecord.dcterms:title: Boucher in Admiral Zumwalt's U.S. Senate Campaign
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Boucher was filmed in Washington, D.C. as part of a commercial for Admiral Zumwalt who was the democratic nominee in Virginia for the U.S. Senate
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Political campaigns--United States
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Boucher, Rick
